message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident it will bring you a lot of value. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer.  I could consider letting it go for $18,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,000. Is this something we can work with?
